remarks: Not-free for restricted existential quantification where ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct.  See ~ nfrexya for a version with ` y ` and ` A ` distinct instead.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-May-2018.)
statement:
nfralxy.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfralxy.2 $e |- F/ x ph $.
nfrexxy $p |- F/ x E. y e. A ph $.
$d x y $.
